db.name: Nông Thiên Kim
db.address: 12 Võ Văn Kiệt p. Nguyễn Thái Bình q.1

db.title: Nhân viên phục vụ, Pha chế
db.about: My name is Thiên Kim. I’m now a junior of International University, major in Hospitality and I’ve never done a part time job before. Actually. I want to do jobs that give me chances to learn something new and meet a lot people. I’m an extrovert and enjoy social and communication activities so I believe that would help much in the position for which I’m applying. I don’t think I’m any more or less special than other applicants. However I do have good qualities like sincerity, loyalty and reliability which I feel are important traits for a person to possess. Besides, I can easily make good relationships with colleagues and they can always count on me in both good times and bad. A person like me will strive to do a great job, serve the best service to customers, if not an excellent one then only get satisfaction from a job well done. If you require any further information from me then please get in touch. In any event, I look forward to hearing from you as the recruitment process progresses
